title: Tank Girl 2
description: She’s back! The crazed counter-culture heroine returns in another completely hatstand series of anarchic adventures, with a new introduction by Alan Martin, and previously unseen material from artist Jamie Hewlett! Join Tank Girl as she escapes from the asylum, goes back to comics school with Hewlett and Martin, meets Sheriff Harry Poussini, enjoys a ‘Summer Love Sensation’, and goes on the road with Jack and Neal in ‘Blue Helmet’! Plus, detective adventures with Booga in ‘Askey & Hunch’, Hewlett and Martin’s Guide to Joy, and much more - including a priceless chance to join Booga’s Treehouse Club! Who could ask for more? Who would?
author: Alan C. Martin
